CoffeeScript is a little language that compiles into JavaScript.

Why ?

  • More simple
  • Compiled Language
  • More expressive
  • More Object
song = ["do", "re", "mi", "fa", "so"]

singers = {Jagger: "Rock", Elvis: "Roll"}

bitlist = [
    1, 0, 1
    0, 0, 1
    1, 1, 0
]

kids =
    brother:
        name: "Max"
        age:  11
    sister:
        name: "Ida"
        age:  9
var bitlist, kids, singers, song;

song = ["do", "re", "mi", "fa", "so"];

singers = {
    Jagger: "Rock",
    Elvis: "Roll"
};

bitlist = [1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0];

kids = {
    brother: {
        name: "Max",
        age: 11
    },
    sister: {
        name: "Ida",
        age: 9
    }
};
loadrun: song.join(" ... ")
